name: Beat Time
description:
Endless Avoidance Game , You are a motor cycle that avoid obstacles

crossing the White game will slow down  the time  

crossing the Black gate  will speed up the time 

let me know your best score  ;) 

HOLD Left click to move the motor cycle 

All assets from Buildbox 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=frwlyCfaeNc

hope you enjoy the game
